alert.note: Alert for Finney; Hamilton; Kearny; Scott (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 18 at 8:09PM CDT until April 18 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Critical Fire Danger Continues Western Zones Tuesday Evening... ...Critical Fire Danger Expected Adjacent to Oklahoma Wednesday... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CDT /9 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 043, 061, 062, 063, 074, 075, 076, 084, 085, AND 086... * AFFECTED AREA...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 043 Scott, Fire Weather Zone 061 Hamilton, Fire Weather Zone 062 Kearny and Fire Weather Zone 063 Finney. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 7 percent. * IMPACTS...Given the ongoing drought and continued dormant vegetation, any ignitions will have the potential to burn out of control quickly. Any outdoor burning, or outdoor activities involving sparks or flames, must be avoided.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
